p: Present study evaluates the content and composition of EO hydrodistilled from giant hogweed as well as the impact of EO on monocot (wheat— Triticum aestivum L.) and dicot species (garden cress— Lepidium sativum L., radish— Raphanus sativus L. and lettuce— Lactuca sativa L.). According to our knowledge this is the first report about the potential phytotoxic effect of EO from giant hogweed.
